text: kharun musayute janatayil pettavanayirunnu. avan avarkketire atikramam kaniccu. nam avann dharalam khajanavukal nalki. orukuttam mallanmarpealum avayute takkealkuttam cumakkan ere prayasappettirunnu. ayalute janata innane paranna sandarbham: "ni ahankarikkarut. ahankarikkunnavare allahu istappetukayilla
